product_name: Snow Peak Hybrid Spatula & Spork Set
long_description: The Snow Peak Hybrid Spatula and Spork Combo offers the lightweight utility of a titanium spork with a heat-resistant spatula attachment that adds extra length for easy pot-stirring. Titanium spork is lightweight and won't rust; heat-resistant polypropylene spatula attaches to spork handle. Each piece in the Snow Peak Hybrid Spatula and Spork Combo measures 6.5 x 1.5 in.
short_description: The Snow Peak Hybrid Spatula and Spork Combo offers the lightweight utility of a titanium spork with a heat-resistant spatula attachment that adds extra length for easy pot-stirring.
